name: AI-Powered Sandwich Maker
description: Engineered an AI system capable of analyzing complex culinary patterns to craft sandwiches tailored to individual taste profiles.

name: Unicorn Rental Platform
description: Developed a highly scalable platform for managing the logistics of mythical creature rentals, including real-time tracking and secure payment systems.

name: Blockchain-based Pizza Tracker
description: Implemented a blockchain solution to ensure end-to-end transparency and accountability in pizza delivery logistics.

name: Augmented Reality Cat Simulator
description: Designed an immersive AR experience replicating feline behavior with advanced physics simulations and environmental interactions.

name: Smart Toaster Automation System
description: Created an IoT-enabled toaster with precision heat control and real-time feedback mechanisms for optimal toasting performance.
